name: Catch The Ball (binnat_musayev)
description:
Catch the Ball is a casual game, it is addictive and fun!
Try to not let ball to collide to edges.

You should catch the ball with sticks using your two fingers. The longer you survive the more you score.
Challenge your friends and try to be the best to catch the ball.
You are trying to catch the ball inside by moving two sticks. Do not let the ball touch the edges. Each touch to sticks gives you point. Try to be more careful with barricades, as they can make difficult to catch the ball by retrieving it. You can track your current and best scores.
By time goes on ball is getting more faster and you have to hurry to catch the ball, game becomes more challenging
have fun to Catch The Ball
